Store Setup


Site Settings
Store Personalization Tab

6 min
purpose the "store personalization" tab allows the admin to personalize the store with various important settings these settings will help to quickly customize the store and preview it on the live store the tab has the below displayed settings – settings enable ‘send email’ functionality in price calculator? – front enable ‘send email’ functionality in price calculator? – front this setting allows the customers to share the prices of a product via email when the admin selects "yes" in the option, the system will enable a ‘send cost estimation’ section along with the price calculator on the front store using which your customers can share the prices of a product through email along with sending the cost estimation via email, the customers will also be able to download the estimate in pdf format display style for language and currency display style for language and currency this setting allows the admin to select the display style for the languages and currency at the front store icon drop down note for displaying the language and currency on the front store, enable their status from the sidebar widget section display type of middle area on homepage – front display type of middle area on homepage – front this feature allows you to choose the content to be displayed in the body section of the homepage the contents can include products, product categories, product categories group, kit products or the admin can write their own cms content display shipping calculator display shipping calculator allows you to display the shipping calculator along with the product price calculator on the storefront selecting 'yes' means the shipping calculator will be displayed for all products selecting 'no' means shipping calculator won't be displayed for any product selecting 'printproduct' means the shipping calculator will be displayed only for the print products i e all the products except the promotional product display style for breadcrumbs front breadcrumbs make the navigation easier this encourages people to visit more pages thus reducing the bounce rates it is usually located at the top of the web pages using this setting, you can define the position of breadcrumbs on your website enable/disable promotional message section enable/disable promotional message section this setting allow the admin to enable or disable the promotional message section and does not allow to create any promotional message on the website
